transcript:
Customer: Kya aapko teen panch ek number nahi dikhna
Customer: Kya matlab bol raha
Customer: Kai video download nahi kar rahe ho
Customer: Hello
Executive: Hello
Executive: Ha sir add ho gaye na aapke sare photos
Customer: Nahi kaha ho gaye abhi tumko bhejne ka wapis idhar aane ka wapis batane ka to hum hi karte baithe abhi ek aadmi liya hai kya karne ka abhi
Executive: Aapne mujhe jitna bheja hai utna add maine kar diya hai abhi aap mujhe aur
Customer: Nahi nahi waisa nahi na humko jis system se mangta hai abhi dekho humne add kiya hai
Customer: Teen product add kiya hai teen char dekho kaisa kiya hai
Executive: Ha ek minute rukiye
Customer: Sir usi perfection ke liye to production team banai gayi hai catalog designing ki wo sari perfection ke sath kam karti hai
Customer: Lekin tumhari protection team kaha gayi hai
Executive: To aap aap ek baat batao sir aap thoda time denge aap
Customer: Nahi nahi madam ye dekho nuksan hum kuch bhi bardasht karte hai nuksan humko bardasht nahi hota kyuki hum zero se hero banne nikal pade
Executive: Mai samajh rahi hu
Customer: Isliye nuksan bear nahi karte hum hum abhi hamara kar rahe hai chalo tumhare upar depend nahi rehne ka kya karne ka
Executive: Mai ye keh rahi hu ki maine internal ek concern raise kar diya hai production team aapko aaj ya kal me call kar legi theek hai aapko jo systematic karana hai wo aapka pura profile ache systematic bana ke degi aisa nahi hai wo kam hi isi ke liye wo baitha hi isi liye gayi hai ki wo ye kam kare
Customer: Chalo theek hai aaj ka din wait karta hai jitna hota hai itna mai karta hai baki sab mai kya karta hai dekhenge
Executive: Aur ye wala concern mai close kar rahi hu
Customer: Karo abhi kya karne ka ha lekin wapis khyal karo abhi kaisa suno abhi jab tak mera pura kam nahi hota tab tak aisa hi call karne ka nahi to tum bolega abhi bhul gaya gaya wo
Executive: Nahi aap mujhe hi call kar lena mera mera number likh lo na aap whatsapp number jispe aap photos bhej rahe ho na
Customer: Ha
Executive: Wahi mera number hai aap usse call karo mere 50 bar karo
Customer: Nahi kal wo baat nahi hai kal hai na wo team ko aaj ya kal jab tumhare pass
Executive: Ho jayegi wo unko wo call karegi nahi karegi to aap call karo
Customer: Bilkul bilkul sir bilkul abhi mai aapka na ye concern close kar rahi hu yaha se kyuki aur sir aap ye mat socho ki aapke product add ache se nahi honge to aapko customer nahi aayega customer aapko aayega aur customer aa raha hai
Customer: Madam hum isme bal safed ho gaye hamare 55 pe khurchi pe baithe hai hum humko sab pata hai kab kya hota hai kuch nahi hota hai kaun mitti baat karta hai kaun chocolate deta hai sab kha chuke hai hum
Executive: Theek hai theek hai sir
Executive: Baki me production team aapko call kar legi theek hai maine internal concern unke liye raise kar diya hai
Customer: Theek
Executive: Theek
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer's photos not added properly.

- Wants systematic profile creation.

- Expresses intolerance for losses.



Resolution:

- Executive raised an internal concern.

- Production team will call in a day or two.

- Executive offered her direct contact number.

- Executive closed the concern.



Next Steps: 

- Production team to call the customer.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- product, catalog, production team, profile, photos
